example.text: Ruth Rodriquez is a single mom. She works full-time, but that still doesn’t make ends meet, so she uses SNAP to keep her three kids fed. It’s far from enough, but it’s the breathing room her family relies on. Republicans’ bill would eliminate that breathing room for millions. [[url]]

Counselors are often the first person kids go to when they start experiencing mental health issues - we should be giving them the resources they need to do their jobs. The Bipartisan Safer Communities Act will help hire and support more mental health professionals in schools.

This is a big win for Minnesotans. Derailments are happening more and more often across the country, and we must act. We need to pass this legislation to get some common-sense safeguards put in place. [[url]]
Justice Alito, you’re a judge – not a doctor. Don’t try to make medical decisions for me or the people that I know. [[url]]

Everyone deserves to have a safe and affordable home, but that’s not the reality for many working families across Minnesota and our country. It was great to speak at the Affordable Housing Summit about creating housing availability for working Minnesotans. [[url]]

Ruth Rodriquez is a single mom. She works full-time, but that still doesn’t make ends meet, so she uses SNAP to keep her three kids fed. It’s far from enough, but it’s the breathing room her family relies on. Republicans’ bill would eliminate that breathing room for millions. [[url]]
